dcterms:description: Structured3D dataset contains 3,500 synthetic departments (scenes) with 185,985 photo-realistic panoramic renderings. The original virtual environment is not publicly accessible, so the rendered panoramas were utilized directly.
dcterms:title: Structured3D

dcterms:creator: A. Chang

M. Niessner
M. Savva
S. Song
A. Zeng
Y. Zhang
dcterms:description: Matterport3D dataset is a large-scale indoor real-world 360◦ dataset, captured by Matterport’s Pro 3D camera in 90 furnished houses (scenes). The dataset provides 10,800 RGB-D panorama images, with some RGB-D signals near the polar region missing.
dcterms:title: Matterport3D

dcterms:creator: J. Straub

dcterms:description: Replica360 dataset contains 18 highly photo-realistic 3D indoor scene reconstructions at room and building scale.
dcterms:title: Replica360
